name: Town of Quandaries
description:
Town of Quandaries Controls

Mouse can be used to give replies, by pressing either the Y (Yes) or N (No) stamp.

Keyboard can be used, with the Y and N key acting as their respective stamps. P and escape pauses the game. Any other input fast forwards interactions.

A University Project

This game was made as a University Project, and as such we would really appreciate it if you could answer a survey about it. You can access it either by scanning or pressing the QR-code below. Also, please play the game before answering the survey.

QR code made using https://www.qr-code-generator.com/
